title: lixue0815
author: lixue0815
content: The world economy is slowly recovering, inflation is getting more and more serious, the average person's salary has become difficult to maintain a normal life, and many people want to try to make some profitable investments.The real estate and stock markets are now very volatile, real estate investment cycles are long, real estate bubbles are relatively large, and liquidity is too low. Now that a lot of people are getting out of the real estate and stock markets and into the cryptocurrency market, which looks to be rising nicely right now, I'd like to create a cryptocurrency discussion group to get together and study the trends! Or anyone who has such a group can add me whatsapp number and let me know, is that ok?My Whatsapp number is +1 619 815 7151My Telgegram username is @lixue0815

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Yes, you can create your own thread here and discuss those trends that you've said together.  It's better to show and view it publicly to avoid member's manipulation just like a group of pump and dump. IMO, I never had joined any group of traders on Telegram, Twitter, Discord, or any social media except it here, all those I mentioned will potentially turn into a pump-and-dump group or it could be members are prone to become scams, these are also known us here a house of scammers.I suggest you create a thread here and publicly discuss what you'd study and once you prove it you may gain the trust of the community or other members too.

comments.author: Vaskiy
comments.body: I suggest you to have a group with your friends and family. Slowly have some conversation about bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies.Make yourself active on different telegram channels that helps you with better understanding about the market.Keep yourself active on the forum to know about the latest trends happening with bitcoin and the futuristic approach on Bitcoin.You could get a good list of books and YouTube Channels suggested, going through them will help you know better about bitcoin.Now share what you learn regularly with your friends and family group and from there start making it a larger group for discussion adding friends of friends and more members.

comments.author: Sakanwa
comments.body: Quote from: lixue0815 on July 03, 2023, 11:29:21 PM The world economy is slowly recovering, inflation is getting more and more serious, the average person's salary has become difficult to maintain a normal life, and many people want to try to make some profitable investments.The real estate and stock markets are now very volatile, real estate investment cycles are long, real estate bubbles are relatively large, and liquidity is too low. Now that a lot of people are getting out of the real estate and stock markets and into the cryptocurrency market, which looks to be rising nicely right now, I'd like to create a cryptocurrency discussion group to get together and study the trends! Or anyone who has such a group can add me whatsapp number and let me know, is that ok?My Whatsapp number is +1 619 815 7151My Telgegram username is @lixue0815  It's a nice idea to create an agenda where not only newbies but every member of the forum to discuss and share ideas about Cryptocurrency, but before you take such step you must have a handful knowledge about cryptocurrency so as to let the forum know that you have idea of what you're doing.You should be engaging and connect with the individuals or community in the platform where you wish to create your group,starting the group with people you're familiar with for a start is not a bad idea because the relationship you have would help build a better connection and understanding with them.Get ideas from other groups in various social media platforms, cause it would improve your discussion level and confidence when interacting with individuals in your group. Create a form of advertisement that would attract crypto enthusiasts, host events, giveaways or create fliers with a form of link that could connect people to your group.

comments.author: Good_Doctor
comments.body: Quote from: lixue0815 on July 03, 2023, 11:29:21 PM The world economy is slowly recovering, inflation is getting more and more serious, the average person's salary has become difficult to maintain a normal life, and many people want to try to make some profitable investments.The real estate and stock markets are now very volatile, real estate investment cycles are long, real estate bubbles are relatively large, and liquidity is too low. Now that a lot of people are getting out of the real estate and stock markets and into the cryptocurrency market, which looks to be rising nicely right now, I'd like to create a cryptocurrency discussion group to get together and study the trends! Or anyone who has such a group can add me whatsapp number and let me know, is that ok?My Whatsapp number is +1 619 815 7151My Telgegram username is @lixue0815Great idea you can start up whatsapp group from your friends around who are inclined to Bitcoin and the rest of real estate you talked about then little by little you grow the group what is important here is that you focus now on building understanding of how things work in term of bitcoin and then you can get anyone close to you to teach you important stuff about it as well as reading online materials or pdfs that teach about Bitcoin. For now focus on yourself!

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: lixue0815 on July 03, 2023, 11:29:21 PMMy Whatsapp number is +1 619 815 7151My Telgegram username is @lixue0815You should be careful for now so that you won't get added to a pump and dump group chat or telegram channel or a scammer's group.You should first create one with the people you know and perhaps they too can add some other people that they know and then you can discuss your new findings, some things you don't quite get well, etc and if you're into trading discuss your techniques how you carry out research before entering a trade, how to improve your techniques, etc.Don't just go around the internet posting your contact info so that you can be added to a group chat, what if you get added to a scammers group that does his scam by controlling multiple accounts all at once, using all of them to discuss in the group making it seems as if they're all being controlled by a different entity and his main goal is to get you to believe in a project or some other stuffs... You really should take cautions if you get added to any group eventually.

comments.author: Latviand
comments.body: Do you have a data to back up those claims about people leaving real estate and stocks in favor of cryptocurrency, that seems kind of unlikely because real estate is a bubble and I think that getting money right now while you still can is a good reason to stay for now in real estate and regarding stocks, isn't it a steady endeavor and people still make money there right? Regarding creating a group, there's already some discussions in the forum so I don't see the point of creating a Telegram group for discussing trends when there's already something for that already existing, don't fix it if it ain't broke right?

comments.author: Fiatless
comments.body: Quote from: lixue0815 on July 03, 2023, 11:29:21 PM The world economy is slowly recovering, inflation is getting more and more serious, the average person's salary has become difficult to maintain a normal life, and many people want to try to make some profitable investments.The real estate and stock markets are now very volatile, real estate investment cycles are long, real estate bubbles are relatively large, and liquidity is too low. Now that a lot of people are getting out of the real estate and stock markets and into the cryptocurrency market, which looks to be rising nicely right now, I'd like to create a cryptocurrency discussion group to get together and study the trends! Or anyone who has such a group can add me whatsapp number and let me know, is that ok?My Whatsapp number is +1 619 815 7151My Telgegram username is @lixue0815 There are so many groups on different social media that have such discussions but just like other members have said you have to be careful. I was introduced to one of these groups and discussions were going well until the creators of the group gradually started introducing their agenda. The target was to gain the confidence of the group members and lure us to invest in a shitcoin. They introduced one worthless coin and told us to invest in it. That's how I stopped commenting and suddenly they disappeared with people's money. If you also want to create your discussion group, ensure your make rules and watch out for these scammers. Don't hesitate to remove any member or group of members that keep on spreading lies or want to promote any scam project. This is why you need to learn more about the crypto market before starting such a group. You need to know when people promote falsehood or a scam project.

comments.author: HajiBagi
comments.body: Quote from: sheenshane on July 03, 2023, 11:43:03 PMYes, you can create your own thread here and discuss those trends that you've said together.  It's better to show and view it publicly to avoid member's manipulation just like a group of pump and dump. IMO, I never had joined any group of traders on Telegram, Twitter, Discord, or any social media except it here, all those I mentioned will potentially turn into a pump-and-dump group or it could be members are prone to become scams, these are also known us here a house of scammers.I suggest you create a thread here and publicly discuss what you'd study and once you prove it you may gain the trust of the community or other members too. Joining other groups in social media is not a bad idea, but not everyone likes it. For example, I don't like joining any other groups outside of this forum because doing so has resulted in some people today becoming victims of scams. Similarly, many people use social media platforms like Twitter and Telegram to con others and steal their suffering.I didn't mean to imply that the formation of groups is undesirable, but rather that I am not overly interested in joining one because it is better to be afraid than to take a chance.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Start by proving yourself first with your predictions hitting it right and you will have many people gushing over your posts and asking for your SM handles. A noob account like yours devoid of any reputation won't garner followership.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: Mpamaegbu on July 04, 2023, 08:50:23 AMA noob account like yours devoid of any reputation won't garner followership.Yes you are right but sometimes the person might be technically sound in terms of Technical Analysis from whatever place he might originates from, but have just found himself or herself over here and wishes to carry out this same skills here. Nevertheless, the second poster already shared a link to the trading discussion section, I believe from op post over there we would know if he truly knows what his doing maybe might gain popularity as we don't think of.

comments.author: Z390
comments.body: I as a person will never take any discussion off this forum for any reasons or whatever, I don't like texting with my phone number through WhatsApp, it's better to create a private thread on the forum for your discussion and you are welcome to do so.Most times, people are just trying to use other people when they come up with ideas of leaving the forum for private conversations, it's always a bad idea, whatever you have in mind is welcome on this forum unless it had nothing to do with crypto, please proceed to share your ideas.

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on July 04, 2023, 09:37:32 AMQuote from: Mpamaegbu on July 04, 2023, 08:50:23 AM~snipped~Yes you are right but sometimes the person might be technically sound in terms of Technical Analysis from whatever place he might originates from, but have just found himself or herself over here and wishes to carry out this same skills here.There's no doubt. That's possible, highly possible, I never ruled it out. My opening sentence, "Start by proving yourself first..." in that same post you quoted from clearly leads OP on the path to genuinely prove themselves if they truly know their onions.Sadly, we've seen these type of cases where those who purport to have a handle on cryptos and then create social media handles end up as average; not so much better than those they want to teach.There was one that started something like this last year and then gave out a Twitter handle. My curiosity drove me to check him out on Twitter. From Twitter he gave us a telegram handle. Dude started well and had a few wins before burning his accounts and those who pooled resources for his trading challenge.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Quote from: Mpamaegbu on July 04, 2023, 04:00:19 PMQuote from: Adbitco on July 04, 2023, 09:37:32 AMQuote from: Mpamaegbu on July 04, 2023, 08:50:23 AM~snipped~Yes you are right but sometimes the person might be technically sound in terms of Technical Analysis from whatever place he might originates from, but have just found himself or herself over here and wishes to carry out this same skills here. Dude started well and had a few wins before burning his accounts and those who pooled resources for his trading challenge. In this scenario we ought to be very mindful especially whatever that concerns social precisely twitter. I stopped channeling my efforts on twitter as I believe people often make false news and gives fake signals in other to benefits them, I could also flashed back then when I joined a WhatsApp that shares trading signals as well. That made me to create account in some of those exchange like hotbit and many, but at ending part I noticed I lost hugely because I wasn't that good in trading whatever. So after some loses I decided not to involved myself anymore with either group or channels that gives out signals or shares ideas in common about trading rather devoting myself the do them myself instead of depending on a fellows skills.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: I think that this is going nowhere. It's hard to maintain a group with the same interests unless there's an incentive. I am having that vibes that this is gonna become a pump and dump group and will eventually be sold to the projects that are looking to have established communities with members already.Quote from: Cantsay on July 04, 2023, 04:42:00 AMYou should be careful for now so that you won't get added to a pump and dump group chat or telegram channel or a scammer's group.This is what I am thinking but I could be wrong too and OP has a genuine purpose, who knows.

comments.author: darewaller
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on July 04, 2023, 11:53:09 PMI think that this is going nowhere. It's hard to maintain a group with the same interests unless there's an incentive. I am having that vibes that this is gonna become a pump and dump group and will eventually be sold to the projects that are looking to have established communities with members already.As long as one has a passion for it, they will do anything and they will never be bored of it especially when they see that they are progressing because many people also support them. It's not only about the money but it is possible to turn your hobby into something that is profitable.If you have that kind of vibe about the project that the OP is promoting then you better follow it and don't join the group but others may feel the opposite. As for me, I'm just neutral because I'm not a fan of any messaging group to discuss things but I'm already contented on what forums like Bitcointalk has to offer. There is still a section here for speculating things
